localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We connect project management software with MS Teams, so you could create tasks and meeting minutes without typing during the call. Focus on conversation, ask call participants for detailed explanations and simply mark from transcription all that’s important.
blogPost.body: We connect project management software with MS Teams, so you could create tasks and meeting minutes without typing during the call. Focus on conversation, ask call participants for detailed explanations and simply mark from transcription all that’s important.
blogPost.title: isLucid - Boost your online meetings efficiency
blogPost.author: Vytenis Pakėnas

localize.description: 我们将项目管理软件与MS Teams连接起来，因此您可以在通话过程中无需打字就能创建任务和会议记录。专注于对话，要求电话参与者进行详细解释，并简单地从转录中标记所有重要的内容。
localize.tagline: 提高您的在线会议效率

localize.description: 我們將項目管理軟件與MS Teams連接起來，因此您可以在通話過程中無需打字就能創建任務和會議記錄。專注於對話，要求電話參與者進行詳細解釋，並簡單地從轉錄中標記所有重要的內容。
localize.tagline: 提高您的在線會議效率

previous.excerpt: To enhance your productivity, Tweek is built around a week calendar view without any hourly scheduling. We’d say it’s the best view to organize your life and work without stress. Use it online or https://tweek.so/calendar/printable it on the wall.
previous.title: Tweek Calendar - Minimal weekly planner and to-do list

localize.description: 为了提高你的工作效率，Tweek是围绕着一周日历视图而建立的，没有任何时间安排。我们会说这是最好的视图，可以让你无压力地安排生活和工作。在线使用或https://tweek.so/calendar/printable 它在墙上。
localize.tagline: 最小的周计划和待办事项清单

localize.description: 爲了提高你的工作效率，Tweek是圍繞着一週日曆視圖而建立的，沒有任何時間安排。我們會說這是最好的視圖，可以讓你無壓力地安排生活和工作。在線使用或https://tweek.so/calendar/printable 它在牆上。
localize.tagline: 最小的周計劃和待辦事項清單

next.excerpt: Waterful is a fresh take on water reminder apps. With multiple healthy challenges to take, friendly notifications to follow & our cute octopus to keep you company, staying hydrated becomes fun.
next.title: Waterful - Turn daily hydration into a fun habit

localize.description: Waterful是一个新鲜的水提醒应用程序。有了多种健康的挑战，友好的通知和我们可爱的章鱼陪伴你，保持水分变得有趣。
localize.tagline: 将日常补水变成一种有趣的习惯

localize.description: Waterful是一個新鮮的水提醒應用程序。有了多種健康的挑戰，友好的通知和我們可愛的章魚陪伴你，保持水分變得有趣。
localize.tagline: 將日常補水變成一種有趣的習慣
